description: Verify user can click on the 'Search Bus' button with valid details.
Verify 'Search Bus' button is disabled when no values are selected
Verify 'Search Bus' button is enabled when valid 'From' and 'To' locations and date are selected.
Verify error message if 'From' and 'To' locations are same.
Verify that the 'Search Bus' button is clickable and navigates to the search result page when valid 'From', 'To', and 'Date' are selected.
